name: eu-susta-info
notes:
### About

Overview from [front page](http://magenta.collexis.net/susta-info/en/index.aspx):

> Susta-Info is a global database of case studies and publications, validated by research institutes, 'associations of cities' and expert groups. Susta-Info is an EU DG Research supported project in the context of the Sixth Framework Program, with priority 1.1.6.3: Global Change Ecosystems.

### Downloading

No bulk download. Material is available via a search interface at:

 * <http://magenta.collexis.net/sustainfo/search/extendedsearch.jspx>

### Data

Fields include:

  * Project start date
  * Project end date
  * Category
  * Full document links
  * Related sites
  * World Region
  * Economic context, GNI
  * Economic context, HDI
  * Policy context
  * Web access
  * Contact details
  * Introduction
  * Summary
  * Problem
  * Approach
  * Results
  * Learning experiences
  * Resources used
  * Finance
  * Location
  * Researcher

### Openness

Not open. [Terms of Use](http://magenta.collexis.net/susta-info/en/terms.aspx) say:

> You may not copy, republish, frame, download, transmit, modify, adapt, create derivative works from, rent, lease, loan, sell, assign, distribute, display, license, sublicense or reverse engineer the site or materials. "Materials" means all information, data, documents, downloads, files, text, images, photographs, graphics, publications and content made available or enabled by the site. In addition, you agree not to use any data mining, robots or similar data gathering and extraction methods in connection with the site or materials.
title: EU - Susta Info
